website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need a spacious, affordable backpack for outdoor gear or for your books and laptop, the Borealis offers excellent space and quality with relatively few quirks and a surprisingly low price.
pros: Durable and spacious enough for most customers needs
Has several pockets, including a large main compartment and a fleece-lined 15-inch laptop sleeve
cons: Some owners gripe that the material is a bit stiff, and a few reported rips in the side pocket mesh with typical use

customer_reviews.title: Bad back? Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack that would allow me to carry my laptop, research, books, etc. and not break my back. This thing is amazing. I put all my stuff in and it felt like nothing. I was having so many back problems with my old backpack and am thrilled at how this works. Definitely recommend the investment especially if you have a bad back.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sis look and feels strong enough to hold her school books
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack wanting to buy a high-quality item that would last years. I spent more on this than on your average backpack with the expectation I would get more life out of the item. You can imagine my disappointment when only two to three months into ownership, with EXTREMELY light use, I already began to see the internal fabric tearing away, as depicted in the photo. Unfortunately, I am outside the return window and therefore have no recourse other than to leave this review. TLDR: Backpack is not worth the cost. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: ismaris

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack. I used to only spend $20-30 on my backpacks but this was worth the extra cash. It keeps my laptop and books dry in the rain. Also, it is a huge backpack. I can basically fit anything I need to. I love this backpack for its looks, size, and adaptability. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Good for Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this backpack for school. The major thing that drew me in was the carrying comfort and amount of space inside. This proves helpful in carrying my school uniform, shoes, stethoscope, laptop, BP cuff, binders, and not to mention, a plethora of textbooks! I've not had it for long enough to speak of its lasting durability, but I do expect great things, and will update! If this book bag is able to withstand all that pressure, I'll purchase again and again. Will update
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The NorthFace Borealis backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice backpack, but really much heavier than I expected without added contents. The wide and rigid shoulder straps are cut to fit the body, but are difficult to adjust and very uncomfortable. The material is clearly made for rugged use and weather proof. Pockets are very handy, and the padded area for a smaller laptop or iPad is what made me order. Overall, the size is just too large for everyday use, and the weight is just too heavy, with even minimal contents.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels even better
customer_reviews.text: To the right in the picture is the bag that I just bought; the bag on the left I have owned for years - it’s the Jester II. The new bag - the Borealis - is a lot tougher, and provides more room for storage. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with easy access pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd North Face Backpack in 20 years. This one is Comfortable, lots of compartments, decent size for day hike. It has hip and chest harness, elastic pockets on side with additional clips on side. Good air flow on back of pack, sturdy and comfortable. Web on front of pack for loose items. Easy access to pockets with bigger zippers. Backpack Material is thicker and tough. Smaller pockets inside backpack for a few items. Looking forward this one lasting me another 20 years of good outdoor memories!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good for pizza
customer_reviews.text: You can fit like 10 Jack's pizzas in this bag so if you love Jack's Pizzas buy this bag and fill'er up.
customer_reviews.author: Snake

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and bulky
customer_reviews.text: This bag is too heavy, I was quite surprised when I pulled it out of the box. I think this is due to the laptop sleeve being bulky and thick. Add a laptop to its weight, along with charger, iPad, etc and your back would be uncomfortable after an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: kamgrn

customer_reviews.title: Nice ergonomic adult backpack
customer_reviews.text: Was initially gonna return this but I'm glad i kept it. Its comfortable for carrying heavy loads, and I can stuff it full and it still wont look too bulky on my petite frame. I sometimes carry two laptops and a set of weekend clothes, and my back has never hurt. Nice ergonomic design and the separate laptop compartment is very convenient. I especially love the amount of space allotted to small items. I only wish there were a security pocket to access things without taking the whole bag off, and that the zipper for the large compartment extended further so I could see into it. Overall a great backpack for walking/commuting to work, and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very small inside
customer_reviews.text: This was a LOT smaller than i thought it would be; not a good choice for high school student. My son got it and then had to go out and get ANOTHER much bigger one for school. He likes it for the weekend, for trooping around the city with friends or staying over places. You can fit a change of clothes and some video game equipment in there, that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: minky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with a defected backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the backpack is supposed to have a straight back, but it seems like there’s a plastic piece that’s in the middle of back that is curved, and made the back of the bag curved. I don’t think this is normal, never seen a backpack with a curved back... very disappointed to get a defected backpack.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag so far.North Face has always meant quality to me.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Venturi North Face backpack for at least 30+ years as a gym and travel bag.It is solid and will outlive me. I need an extra bag the the Borealis bag appears close to as sturdy as my faithful Venturi NF bag. I have multiple coats from the nineties to current years from North Face.All are fresh and functional. I trust the North Face quality and expect this new bag will also last beyond my life span. Beautiful sturdy high quality bag.Just please make them in the USA again...That is my only quality concern.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: One of the best back packs I have ever purchased. I use this for work and carry my laptop, documents, water bottle, umbrella, and lots of cords. It helps that everything isn't at the bottom of the bag. What I mean is that each zipper pocket distributes the weight so that everything inside the bag isn't all the way at the bottom and it doesn't look like a sagging knapsackon your back.
customer_reviews.author: D Kim

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Pack.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say it enough. Coming from a Supreme Cordura bag with very basic features this is a world's difference. The flex vent system is still top tier comfort and support. 4 compartments total, Main compartment has a ton of space while the laptop compartment is super streamlined and padded. The other compartments are designed really well with one being a quick access micro fiber-lined compartment and the other being a very well organized compartment for pens & smaller gadgets. Only disappointing thing? No pouch with cable pass through for charger, you see it a lot now and even on cheap bags. Surprised this one didn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: SoupCanHarry

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack with plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack in 2016 because a friend recommended it being “a great and durable backpack”. They were right I still use the backpack everyday after over 2 years. There is plenty of storage with 2 big compartments and 1 small. There is a laptop protector inside where you can perfectly fit your computer, I use this for everyday school and on the weekends I take it hiking and camping. The backpack truly is the strongest one I’ve ever owned, it is such a great backpack and I am never moving to another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got nothing like the NF Borealis. Looks like a fake! This one only had 2 zippered compartments. Inside the compartments were plain, got zero organization pockets, no tablet sleeve, nothing! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using for work and hiking
customer_reviews.text: Great pack. I was looking for something that I could use for both work and hiking. This fits my 17” work laptop fine, plus it has a second full sized storage for paperwork. There are several other smaller pockets and sleeves. The double side bottle holders and chest/waist straps are perfect for day hikes. I like the strings/straps that let you tighten up the pack if it isn’t fully loaded. Looks clean and uncluttered.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build. Beautiful design. Extremely functional.
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the pictures that I found online of the Borealis Backpack were not comparable to the way it looks and feels in person. It's really an attractive design. I mostly use it to store my laptop and books. However, it's rugged. The laptop compartment is secure and slightly raised from the bottom of the backpack to reduce impact with the floor when being placed down. I'd prefer a few additional smaller compartments along the side of the backpack for extra storage but so far that hasn't been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: George Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: One Zipper was Stuck
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product, everything seemed to be working fine. The pockets were high quality and the padding was better than I expected. However, I did run into one problem. One of the zippers was somewhat defective. One of the zippers for the big middle pocket wouldn't run smoothly across the curved lining. It kept getting stuck at a certain part. I'm sure that it is just a defect and believe other models wouldn't have the same issue. I will be returning this product in exchange for a new one. All I ask is that the new product doesn't have any defects. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Bag That Works On An Airplane Or A Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag as a work bag. I wanted a backpack that could replace my laptop bag and this was a great choice. Here are the highlights: - Very versatile - Large, but not a cave of a backpack - Coparents are well thought out - Can easily be used on an airplane and on a bicycle - Nice looking and well constructed Everything is well thought out and it successfully replaced my laptop bag
customer_reviews.author: W. Hall

customer_reviews.title: and it's perfect. It has enough pockets to hold everything
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for several work trips already, and it's perfect. It has enough pockets to hold everything, and the front pocket is really convenient to hold your passport when travelling for quick access. My laptop fits perfectly (macbook pro). It has enough room to carry everything i need to for work each day as well. I've owned other north face backpacks, and this one looks like it'll last as long as i need it to.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bagpack
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag pack, this is what I was looking for, great space, it has space for all your stuff included your laptop. I got the green color with looks amazing. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Undeserving of the Northface name
customer_reviews.text: I have a few issues with this bag, first was that the bottom is slanted so it does not stand up when on a table or the floor... it just flops over. Second the admin pocket its awfully designed, when you put anything in it, it protrudes into the main compartment making getting anything out of the bottom of the main compartment a nightmare without first emptying the admin section. Finally the shoulder straps "suspension system" has begun to fall apart after only a couple of months of light use to and from work. I'd look elsewhere for a quality pack.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kocak

customer_reviews.title: Will last you a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: This is the go-to backpack of my husband. For it’s $100 price, I would hands-down say it’s a total value for our money. We got this for our backpacking trip. Used it for several months now and it still looks new! So many compartments too and the material is really good, finely crafted. We own backpacks from the same brand but for a cheaper price— they serve they’re purpose as well but this one is topnotch.
customer_reviews.author: Hunnybunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife to use as a commuter bag for her laptop (15") and other items. She drives, walks and takes the bus to work so she needed a good durable every day bag and this works great! It has enough pockets to keep things organized but not so many that's your always searching for stuff. Nice size for her smaller frame and she says its comfortable. It's on its third year of daily use and still no tears or broken zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Hanover Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and stylish backpack. It has compression strap, sternum strap, stabilizer strap, hip belt and thick cushion on shoulder strap and back make it comfortable to wear for long-time, even with extra weight for travel, hiking Upper compartment for general: laptop, etc. Has an extra tight and firm compartment to hold paperwork, documents. Lower compartment with multiple pockets and pen holders, zipper pockets. Small pocket with zipper in the front and 2 side pockets. Great backpack overall.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade
customer_reviews.text: This new version is a bigger bag yet somehow has less space. It looks so bulky on person but is extremely narrow only allowing flat items. The back padding goes below the height of the rest of the backpack making it Impossible trying to set up straight even when against something. Nowhere to hide all the long straps that swing around when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've carried a backpack from other vendors BUT this one, this backpack - WOW!! I'm an IT professional and have to admit, I carry a ton of tech "stuff" with me. This backpack handles ALL my needs. Plenty of full or smaller sized pockets. Plenty of over all space for laptops, chargers, switches and many cables that I can keep in different pockets and find quickly. An amazing replacement backpack!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zigmeister

customer_reviews.title: Not a school backpack
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and large. Use it for college but the straps are made of a material way to harsh for bare skin since it will get you some scratches. It’s stiff so it’s hard to get it it off and on of you. I’ll try to get use to it, but actually considering ordering another one softer and less hike-like. Good quality though just not the right one for me. And five stars because it IS a good backpack. For traveling, if your hiking or something.
customer_reviews.author: Broken grapes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality materials and construction, but even better design
customer_reviews.text: One of the best backpacks you could find for the price range, Cordura material is definitely a plus but the most important feature is the great design and solid construction, everything is reinforced and has an inner structure that makes it strong but lightweight. Also the ergonomics and the way the weight gets well distributed plays an important role in the overall experience of carrying your every day stuff, not too big but not a small capacity backpack either. You won't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: jordi prat

customer_reviews.title: The seller replaced the backpack under warranty which is great. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack and used if for a month and the water bottle pouch began to tear and eventually it ripped and would no longer hold a water bottle. The seller replaced the backpack under warranty which is great. Thank you. But for the product, I could not give it a better rating than what I posted.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: It fits my back ergonomically, seems to be built solid, and I have seen good durability from previous NorthFace gear, so I am assuming it will last for a long time, unlike my other pack by an unknown Chinese brand. Maybe in time I'll get used it, but I don't really like the pockets arrangement. It seems a bit bigger than my previous pack, but has less bulk space.
customer_reviews.author: geezer2017

customer_reviews.title: Ok backpack just too small and not made of high quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it wasn't as big as it looked in the pictures. The backpack zippers were all completely plastic pieces and just didn't feel like $68.00 quality. The layout of the pockets was not functional for more than one electronic because the laptop slot was the entire back pocket. I did love the water bottle holders on the sides were great for big or small bottles though and the bungee was a nice addition to hold a sweatshirt or jacket when you're not wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Hatten

customer_reviews.title: So many compartments so you can organize your stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it has so many pockets so I can easily organize my stuff! I use this backpack to go to college and the gym and I can put my Ipad my shorts, one t-shirt, my notebook, and my protein shake! everything fits in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Good size, storage. You need to know this backpack does not stand on its own or sit on the base upright, it falls over on its face. That said. I love the comfort of this pack. I can carry heavy load of still photography gear, water and iFAK kit. And a 15in laptop if I wanted to. I would not hesitate to buy this pack again.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is new so I cannot comment on how it holds up over time BUT it looks very well made. It's trendy and looks cool. It's also very functional and roomy. Lots of spaces for books, lap top, etc. The North Face is a very reputable brand and I've had great experiences with other products from them. I have high hopes this bag will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Lots of little storage compartments and holds a lot. Comfortable straps. Waist strap is removable. The back is stiff and may feel awkward when it’s not full but it feels comfortable to wear. Only negative thing is that it will not stand up vertically when you set it down.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: AA+++++++
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the BEST ever. No Complaints yet and my husband uses it daily. He loves all the compartments. It is very durable it was made very well. It is more expensive than other back packs but you get what you pay for. You need to continually replace the cheaper ones. This one will last years. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: She loves this bag but says she does have some difficulty getting it into her locker. However, with her playing volleyball and having practice after school this bag is large enough to get all her things into for both school and sports. We are a HUGE fan of the north face and will always be! Great bag for ages 12+ even into college. I’m sure this bag will outlast many others I’ve bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R2

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend for College Students
customer_reviews.text: I use it on a daily basis for college and I love it! My Mac book is safe and protected in it's own pouch with cushion at the bottom. The straps help relieve pressure and weight off of your shoulders compared to other bags. Second zipper enclosure allows for lots of organization for pens, pencils, note pads, thumb drives, lead refills, etc. Would recommend for college students! The sides keep your beverages, water bottles, small ideas, keys, etc. secure from falling out since they're not mesh pockets
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack hold very well! I used it for a school year, and you can hardly tell it was used for that long. One thing I do recommend thought, is that if your going to use this backpack for school, do not place it directly on the ground. Since it is a very sturdy backpack, a part of the bottom will rub against the floors very hard and begin the tear. This backpack has so many pockets, so it’s great for storing everything you probably need. Not expensive either, but I still don’t see myself buying another anytime soon because of how durable these are. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Alba

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile and seems to be well made. Can be used for any use. Hiking, biking, school, college, around town, traveling and many other
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using my bag for 3 months now...it’s my favorite backpack! I love everything about it. Big pockets (holds ALOT) The side drink holders stretch out and fit every size of bottle, safely. The straps and everything is holding up nicely with heavy use and on top of everything it’s such a cute bag!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this bookbag.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bookbag I bought. My son had his first one from 6th to 9th grade. I have washed this several times it has never fallen apart. He now uses the first one when we fly as his luggage, it has so much room and it still held up through all the tossing around. I decided to buy a second one this year in a different color hes now in 10th grade and I have no dought that this will last until he's out of school.
customer_reviews.author: Mauredi

customer_reviews.title: Great for college students
customer_reviews.text: I keep my laptop, notebooks, and a few small textbooks in this everyday. I haven't had any problems with durability or comfort. The backpack looks cool, feels of quality materials, and functions well. The water bottle pouches are a nice touch. They are very stretchy and fit a variety of size bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the name
customer_reviews.text: As everyone knows North Face is a well established bag and would figure that it is a good product. You would be correct in that assumption. I bought this bag and packed it for school and for a camping trip I'm gonna do. It had plenty of room for both situations. I've put it to its limits and it has still worked perfectly fine. I'm hoping to make lots of memories between camping and school with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stewart

customer_reviews.title: #bestbackpackeverever
customer_reviews.text: This is straight up the best backpack I have ever bought! This so well made and the pockets are lined with fleece thats super soft like too kittens on your hands. It has two side drink holder holders and the backpack expands when you unclick the latches on tbe side. Looks waterproof but idk for sure because it hasn't been used out in the rain yet. Overall it's a great buy and looks like it will last doe years to come.
customer_reviews.author: alba telez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Laptops
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for several months and use it as my work bag. I wanted a bag that protected my Laptop since it is expensive. I have had several North Face products and always happy with their products. I get several compliments on the bag and never had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: great everyday pack
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a day pack and a laptop bag. I normally carry a 16" lenovo yoga and a 16" Dell in it at the same time for work, along with a lunch and a 32oz Nalgene bottle in each bottle carrier. Haven't found a better small pack yet.
customer_reviews.author: TheLastHouseOnTheLeft

customer_reviews.title: Tough, durable and great
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack,. I used it mostly to carry my 13' laptop, or my work 15' laptop, plus other items, sunglasses, glasses, external hds, kindle, water bottle, dslr... All the compartments are well made and tough, durable as you can expect. Usually, I carry this backpack full of items, and withstands very well.
customer_reviews.author: climber91

customer_reviews.title: Great North Face quality
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a backpack when I'm riding my motorcycle. The waist clip is very handy and easy to fasten. Keeps the bag from riding up on my neck too far. Sufficient storage...not overly large, so you sacrifice some of the storing capacity as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Roadie

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy but good for toting and plenty of good options on it.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect with those bag. The only issue I have is it’s inability to stay upright, like it’s top heavy, when either leaned against a wall or chair. Continously toppled over, no matter if it’s empty or you try to put hameavy stuff at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JHalstead

customer_reviews.title: Great bag this
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome backpack in the Northface lineup. More suitable for a taller person given its size, but the smaller version would work just fine for shorter people. Lots of space and pockets for all your items and gear. Water resistant & sexy 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps need improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is sturdy for sure, however I am a bit disappointed with the comfort of the padding in the shoulder straps. They are a bit too firm for long term wear imo. If you plan on wearing this all day, I'd upgrade. It did have good amount of space inside however for enough clothes (mens) & flat shoes for a 2 night stay.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: North Face Borealis backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very expressive, exactly what my grandson wanted and so far it is meeting all the challenges a 16 year old young man can give it.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Premium backpack
customer_reviews.text: Really good bag for the commute to and from work and for traveling. This bag has plenty of room for my tablet and work laptop and plenty of space in the big pocket for headphones (in case), books, rain coat, etc. It feels durable and appears to be made of quality material. The camo and taupe green color combination looks nice. I have a North face surge backpack and its lasted for well over 8 years through heavy use and just wanted to upgrade. Overall great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeret

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pockets for everything including a laptop
customer_reviews.text: This back pack when fully packed is so supportive and comfortable on your back! It also looks great with lots of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: momtutor

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, NOT enough space.
customer_reviews.text: I like the organization but don’t get this backpack if you have a lot of books and papers. I am a college student and this barely fits one textbook with a notebook and a folder. Definitely not enough space for me.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, and actually fairly priced considering the brand
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, and actually fairly priced considering the brand. Apparently placing the North Face logo automatically results in a 100% price increase. Want to sell your 2003 Buck Regal? NORTH FACE STICKER
customer_reviews.author: davebkpr

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Just didn’t have as many pockets as I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was sturdy and seemed durable. The 2 large pockets were very deep. I had to return it for the following reasons. 1. Needed 3 large pockets, bag has 2 2. The laptop pocket is not very wide so you couldn’t use it for anything but a laptop. Pockets did not zip all the way down. Overall had this backpack met my particular needs I would’ve loved it. The color was awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: North face backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the backpack,going to be for this school year.. Hopefully it holds up good.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Digging it I’ve always used a over the shoulder bag in my adult years. I thought I’d give a backpack type MacBook case this time and I’m pleased. Build quality is great with many ways to organize my stuff for work
customer_reviews.author: krs7

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: my last north daypack has been used and abused for many many years and is still fine, but this is a better design for me - i use it for everything from gym to kayak to business meetings and conferences and carrying computer to shopping bag to day hikes to overseas travel
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Like this backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this bag for school. It carries his laptop safely and the color makes it easy to spot.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Fourroux

customer_reviews.title: Bought for work
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as my brother's work bag. Its durable and does the job, and is nice enough that we can take it on a job site. He's had it for 3 months and has had no problems, zippers work well. He's 6'3" and it doesn't look small on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better picture, not neon pink, it's red
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and it's not neon pink string, it's red. So my son got a new backpack for Christmas. Needs a better picture with description.
customer_reviews.author: CrunchNMunch

customer_reviews.title: Super backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who was heading to college and wanted a durable backpack. Even though he doesn’t like to copy his sister ,who went to college last year, he had to have the same backpack by her recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack holds A LOT of stuff! I use it daily for work, and I’ve also used it for travel. It can hold a few days worth of clothes, plus your laptop. Has plenty of pockets for chargers, cables, etc. the water bottle pocket is big and deep. Fits under an airplane seat, even when it’s pretty full.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: There's enough room and pockets to hold all her gear and we're pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wanted this backpack for school - explained to her that due to cost this will need to last here through college. That said, it's a solid backpack that's well made and durable. There's enough room and pockets to hold all her gear and we're pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy

customer_reviews.title: This backpack withstands rough users.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is an excellent choice when you are looking for a product to stand up to that rough and tough user. The zippers are strong and the tabs are easy to grab. The seams are,well made. The pockets are ideally located and appropriately sized. We are life long L L Bean customers and are happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: CRP

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been great so far! We’ve had amazing luck with the longevity of NorthFace backpacks so had to buy one for the next kid!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Great, wish it has more compartments
customer_reviews.text: Its a great backpack. It looks awesome and its good quality. However, if you carry a variety of things in the backpack you might find it doesn't have enough compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Hector

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not ideal size
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was smaller than I expected. It is more difficult to get items in and out of from Northface bags I have had in the past. I gave it 4 stars because Northface makes great quality bags
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my high schooler as backpack for school. He likes it. I think it's a bit awkward. There are alot of pockets but none of them are very big. I think it's a bit top heavy, it's always tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, very comfortable. These have traveled the world with us from trekking 25+ miles up and down the streets of New York, to the beaches and mountains of Bali. They have proven very comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.author: clintb

customer_reviews.title: Great for junior high kids.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack for my daughter.She just realized one of the buckles is also a safety whistle.Its more than what I expected.Such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my highschool student. She is absolutely happy with this choice. It appears to be of better construction than prior backpacks she has had, and the features make it very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: UNC DAD

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff backing
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Fits my 17" laptop perfectly. Could use a little more zippers/pockets The backing is very stiff. Backpack will not sit upright.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product as described. The space is limited; you won't fit as much as you had imagined. Could use more pockets. Quality very good and comfortable to wear. Probably fits better on people who are of a thin complexion. I am a bit bulky and it fits me. I would have liked a bigger bag to better fit my bulky body.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Dosent protect labtop good
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product that north face made it is not good for a labtop it dosent strap it in at all there almost no padding for the labtop and the bag is not comfortable to waer around no padding in the shoulders theres almost no room in the bag
customer_reviews.author: shanda

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! It has separate pockets for all Your things. Easy to slip on and off. Loys of room.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Creaser

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very durable, strong, backpack. It has many zippers and pockets for extra space. I also like that it has two bottle pockets on the side. My only concern is the weight, it is a little heavy for me personally! But, still, overall a nice backpack. Would recommend for college
customer_reviews.author: Saj

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: have used it regularly for about 2 months and even took it on a long trip to asia. this thing can hold quite a bit of stuff in it and two of my chromebooks fit in it perfectly. very well made with quality stitching and materials.
customer_reviews.author: johnny benefit

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Broke in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for school. We really liked the backpack and north face has a great name brand for quality products but this broke in less than 3 months. The water bottle holders on the side came apart at the bottoms and water bottles now just fall through. I’m reaching out to north face directly hoping they will replace. Will update this review soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kevin Tougas

customer_reviews.title: Mini
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a nice durable backpack but it doesn’t hold a lot and even the compartments are small. Paid a lot for a little Northface Men’s back pack. My LL Bean holds more, cost less and is FAR easier to have repaired or replaced!
customer_reviews.author: June Mineau

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good size
customer_reviews.text: Love the backpack, has a lot of space and i can tell it is a durable product. It is a bit larger than I thought but still great for what I need it for. The part your back is against is pretty stiff, but padded and will be good for support while carrying a lot of books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious but not bulky and ugly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for school (college) it seems small at first but there are many compartments with ample space. The backpack has supported straps and back so you’re confortable even with a heavy load. I am able to fit all my textbooks, notebooks, makeup and even snacks with room to spare. My 40oz hydroflask fits in both side pockets with ease. Overall very durable and functional for various activities besides school.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria liseth

customer_reviews.title: Ok, wish it was more spacious
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my college bound son. It is very sturdy, but not very spacious because of the compartmentalizations.
customer_reviews.author: GMM in dallas

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. Ive had alot of northface backpacks. Im a film student and this holds most equipment and my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: Hiking through the Amazon basin in "jungle" rain. Not one drop of water got in. Amazing bag for day trips or second carry on. This is probably the best backpack I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo M

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value, incredible look.
customer_reviews.text: I can't express my love enough for the North Face backpacks. Been using mine daily for 2 years now for college and it shows absolutely no wear and tear. Lots of space and organization. Most of all it looks very nice. It has a sporty and sleek look that doesn't look bad when its overstuffed. Great product for the price. The North Face makes the best backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Romberger

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with great space.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my other borealis backpack from almost 6 years ago and I’m very happy. The ponderosa green is such a nice color and the quality of the bag is even better. There’s a lot of room for your things and it’s easy to keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reus

customer_reviews.title: North Face backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great smaller sized backpack. Doesn't hold as much as a full sized one (Swiss Army), but is terrific for it's size. Lots of storage compartments & very durable.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this backpack. I considered this as a splurge item because I'm rather thrifty and buyouts clothing/accessories from the thrift store or Gabriel Brothers. So whenI buy something a little more expensive, I expect the quality to be nice. This definitely exceeded my expectations. It is extremely well made, water resistant, and supportive from my back. It holds everything I need for school and has also been wonderful for traveling. I highly recommend this bag if you alerting for a high-quality product. 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: As usual, a high quality product from The North Face. Excellent backpack for carrying all of the essentials needed for a long busy day at college.
customer_reviews.author: Arcadia DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for commuting on the bus!
customer_reviews.text: Compact design for ease of Metro communting. Sits on your lap, or between your feet easily. No hanging parts to get pulled, or stepped on, or accidentally open. Lots of rooms for books, computer, change of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: E. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack when I started college a few years ago and is the absolute best backpack that I have ever purchased. I love the design, color, and durability. I have had a few times where the backpack got wet from light rain and did not have any damages whatsoever. The laptop sleeve fit my 15" laptop perfectly and has pockets to fit everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Forced headlines is one reason I never write reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and made well but it has horrible pocket design and general usability is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt
